Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands

package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands
Contains command classes implementing the Command pattern for various flight booking operations.

This package implements the Command design pattern to encapsulate all system operations as executable command objects. Each command handles a specific operation such as adding flights, managing customers, or processing bookings.

Command Categories:

  • Flight Commands: AddFlight, DeleteFlight, ListFlights, ShowFlight
  • Customer Commands: AddCustomer, DeleteCustomer, ListCustomers, ShowCustomer
  • Booking Commands: AddBooking, CancelBooking, UpdateBooking
  • System Commands: Help, LoadGUI
  • Class
    Description
    AddBooking
    Command to create a new flight booking for a customer.
    AddCustomer
    Command to add a new customer to the system.
    AddFlight
    Command to add a new flight to the system.
    CancelBooking
    Command to cancel an existing booking.
    Command
    Interface for all command objects in the system.
    DeleteCustomer
    Command to delete a customer from the system.
    DeleteFlight
    Command to delete a flight from the system.
    DeleteFlight.BookingCancellationInfo
    Inner class to track booking cancellation information for rollback purposes.
    Help
    Command to display help information about available commands.
    ListCustomers
    Command to list all customers in the system.
    ListFlights
    Command to list all flights in the system.
    LoadGUI
    Command to launch the graphical user interface.
    ShowCustomer
    Command to display detailed information about a customer.
    ShowFlight
    Command to display detailed information about a flight.
    UpdateBooking
    Command to update an existing booking.
